column4: 'sudo apt-get install language-support-translations-uk' does not show gedit/GTK+ apps in Ukranian.  Am I missing something?
you need to be running the ukranian translations, ask in the ukranian channel.
The problem is I don't actually know Ukranian!   I am a developer testing a Ukranian translation quirk for my app
then you know more than me, better to ask in #ubuntu-devel or #ubuntu-motu.
